titles.title: VA-DoD Shared Medical Facilities Act of 2019
VA-DoD Shared Medical Facilities Act of 2019

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Veterans Affairs authority to enter into agreements for the planning, design, and construction, or leasing, of facilities to be operated as shared medical facilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
VA-DoD Shared Medical Facilities Act of 2019
This bill authorizes the Department of Defense and the Department of Veterans Affairs to enter into agreements for the planning, design, and construction, or leasing, of facilities to be operated as shared medical facilities.
